description:
Locate is a program that can be used to find files from your hard disks. Before you can use program you must create a database containing file names. To create a database, use choose Update databases in locate32.exe or run updtdb32.exe. Check Databases tab in Settings dialog, for example, to index more drives than local drives.

For more help run updtdb32 -h or locate -h. 

[Source code](https://sourceforge.net/p/locate32/code/HEAD/tree/)
summary: Quickly find files and directories based on file names with index
author: Janne Huttunen
